alert.note: Alert for Antelope Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued November 27 at 2:17AM PST until November 27 at 8:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 24 degrees expected. * WHERE...Antelope Valley. * WHEN...Until 8 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Damage to outdoor plumbing possible. Expect severe damage to crops or sensitive vegetation, and harm to unprotected pets or livestock.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
